attributes.additional_details: go in and everywhere else is being put into strict "zones" we are also a very football orientated year and are being made to stop playing football anywhere other than the playing field that isn't even open all the time
attributes.background: P7s at our school are now being forced to do some of the Learning Assistants' jobs. We don't ask a lot only that things stay the way they always have been. There has never been any trouble before and now P7s at having to give up the part of the playground that only they can

rejection.details: The UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for your school to take and you should raise your concerns with them.
